input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is HPSEActor

1. Adds a specified port to a zone.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>add</command> <category>zone</category> <process-id>update-zone</process-id> <command-arguments> <port-id>1003</port-id> <zone-id>1001</zone-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. zone-id[Required] id of the zone to be updated. port-id[Required] id of the port to be added.
2. Adds a zone alias to a zone.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>add</command> <category>zone</category> <process-id>update-zone</process-id> <command-arguments> <zonealias-id>1003</zonealias-id> <zone-id>1001</zone-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. zone-id[Required] id of the zone to be updated. zonealias-id[Required] id of the zonealias to be added.
3. Removes a specified port from a zone.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>remove</command> <category>zone</category> <process-id>update-zone</process-id> <command-arguments> <port-id>1003</port-id> <zone-id>1001</zone-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. zone-id[Required] id of the zone to be updated. port-id[Required] id of the port to be removed.
4. Removes a zone alias from a zone.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>remove</command> <category>zone</category> <process-id>update-zone</process-id> <command-arguments> <zonealias-id>1003</zonealias-id> <zone-id>1001</zone-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. zone-id[Required] id of the zone to be updated. zonealias-id[Required] id of the zonealias to be removed.

documentation.description:
This wrapper supports the following requirements:-
1. Adds a specified port to a zone. 2. Adds a zone alias to a zone. 3. Removes a port from a zone. 4. Removes a zone alias from a zone.
